whyOneTap.title: Why $ONETAP?
whyOneTap.subtitle: The only memecoin built by gamers, for gamers

gamers.title: Built by Gamers, for Gamers
gamers.description: Community-driven from day one. No VCs, no whales. Just pure competitive gaming culture transformed into a movement.

secure.title: 100% Secure & Transparent
secure.description: LP locked for 6 months, contract audited, and fully verified. No rug pulls, just headshots.

utility.title: Real Utility = Real Value
utility.description: Tap-to-Earn, exclusive NFT drops, and future in-game integrations. This is more than just a meme.

manifesto.title: The OneTapper Manifesto
manifesto.subtitle: Our code. Our rules. Our community.
manifesto.preamble: We, the OneTappers, united by our love of gaming and distrust of traditional finance, declare these truths to be self-evident: that all gamers are created equal, that we are endowed with certain unalienable rights, and that among these are Life, Liberty, and the pursuit of Headshots.

principle1.title: We Are Gamers First
principle1.description: This isn't about getting rich quick. It's about building something real for the community we love. Finance bros, turn back now.

principle2.title: No Whales, Only OneTappers
principle2.description: We reject pump-and-dump schemes. We reject manipulation. Everyone here has an equal shot at success.

principle3.title: HODL Like a Pro Player
principle3.description: Great plays require patience. Diamond hands beat paper every time. Trust the process.

principle4.title: Memes Are Our Language
principle4.description: We don't take ourselves too seriously, but we take our community seriously. Culture first, profits second.

principle5.title: Transparency > Hype
principle5.description: No hidden agendas. No secret allocations. What you see is what you get. Always.

manifesto.welcomeMessage: You're now officially a OneTapper. Check your email for exclusive updates.
manifesto.footerNote: By signing, you're joining a community that values transparency, gaming culture, and fair play above all else.

integrations.title: Gaming Integrations
